channel.title: Serendipitous Oulipo Haiku
channel.description: Generated haikus based on the serendipitous-oulipo-haiku project

item.title: when you turn in a
item.description:

wrapping around beams

item.title: look up — perspective
item.description:
look up — perspective
you can be a single point
a moment will do

item.title: I know, even though
item.description:
I know, even though
stretch out from golden circles
good morning Glory

item.title: simple churns of thought
item.description:
simple churns of thought
immersing in the moment
life’s intricacies

item.title: the gurgling crows
item.description:
the gurgling crows
coastline measured by atom
only roots remain

item.title: ducklings form a mass
item.description:
ducklings form a mass
just the other day, grape leaves
birds flit from my path

item.title: sunlight in canyons
item.description:
sunlight in canyons
another bloom; another
absolute beauty

item.title: why isn’t solstice
item.description:
why isn’t solstice
I feel their anxiety
completing a proof

item.title: I always look up
item.description:
I always look up
converse in intimate joy
vestige roots of time

item.title: sometimes you just run
item.description:
sometimes you just run
approach ing— and yet you’re here
the person you are

item.title: so many curves here
item.description:
so many curves here
of this precious blue planet
are manifested

item.title: this small white primrose
item.description:
this small white primrose
reach with those ancient branches
to the morning beams

item.title: sing to the kitties
item.description:
sing to the kitties
echoes with branches in streams
utter abundance

item.title: you are potential
item.description:
you are potential
as a Bee is to flower
as though I am not

item.title: you harbor beauty
item.description:
you harbor beauty
to truly reflect on you
between our essence

item.title: lofty sequoia
item.description:
lofty sequoia
swept away — a tide of men
resonant with us

item.title: I know what you are!
item.description:
I know what you are!
are but loops in the garment
conforming to curve

item.title: images within
item.description:
images within
cohesion yet separate
you bring me such joy

item.title: wake up to a hug
item.description:
wake up to a hug
just keep going — it is but
of that great distance

item.title: and when you suffer
item.description:
and when you suffer
half buried in sand ripples
and then held my breath

item.title: there you are, my hawk
item.description:
there you are, my hawk
maybe all flowers do this
this brief existence

item.title: how the light alone
item.description:
how the light alone
may bring forth fruits beyond us
a night reflection

item.title: some of these rivers
item.description:
some of these rivers
hummingbird stands firm and still
never let yours go

item.title: I wish I knew how
item.description:
I wish I knew how
in fall you came, but no more
boardwalk to the sky

item.title: love gutter bubbles
item.description:
love gutter bubbles
and yet we experience
of growth beneath soil
